headline: Howmet Aerospace Posts Strong Q2 Growth as Top Executive Sells Shares Before Resignation
summary: Howmet Aerospace Inc. (NYSE:HWM) is one of the 12 High-Risk High-Reward Growth Stocks to Buy Right Now. The company’s top executive makes a bold move following a strong second quarter. Howmet Aerospace Inc. (NYSE:HWM) reported strong Q2 2025 earnings on July 31, 2025. The results highlighted a revenue of $2.05 billion, a 9% year-over-year increase. The […]
